definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Glass and a Half Full Productions, home of Cadbury Dairy Milk, the gorilla and trucks.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃和半饱制作，吉百利牛奶，大猩猩和卡车回家。

sentences.english: The ape apes the ape-man in everything he does.
sentences.chinese: 大猩猩一切都模仿猿人。

sentences.english: Is Rollie an exception, or are all gorillas as clever?
sentences.chinese: 罗妮是个特例，还是所有的大猩猩都一样聪明？

sentences.english: But she brought the plight of the gorillas to everyone's attention.
sentences.chinese: 但是她让每个人开始关注大猩猩的困境。

sentences.english: Individual mountain gorillas have never been re-introduced to the wild successfully.
sentences.chinese: 独个的山地大猩猩从来不能再度在野外成功存活。

sentences.english: Only about 380 of these Gorillas can be found in the DRC.
sentences.chinese: 刚果民主共和国境内约有380只银背山地大猩猩。

sentences.english: A400- pound gorilla on the loose at a zoo in the Netherlands.
sentences.chinese: 在荷兰，一个400磅的大猩猩逃出了动物园。

sentences.english: A 400-pound gorilla on the loose at a zoo in the Netherlands.
sentences.chinese: 在荷兰，一个400磅的大猩猩逃出了动物园。

sentences.english: Mister Schaller's first major interest was mountain gorillas.
sentences.chinese: 夏勒先生的最初兴趣是山地大猩猩。

sentences.english: The huge gorilla scared audiences when he climbed the Empire State Building.
sentences.chinese: 观众被一个爬上纽约洲建筑物的大猩猩吓呆了。

sentences.english: Fossey also began an active campaign to stop the killing of the gorillas.
sentences.chinese: 福西也开始积极活动，停止杀害的大猩猩。

sentences.english: The males scarcely glanced in my direction.
sentences.chinese: 雄性大猩猩则几乎没有朝我的方向看一眼。

sentences.english: SWING】The big ape swung itself from branch to branch.
sentences.chinese: 那大猩猩在树枝间荡来荡去。

sentences.english: Why do hummingbirds and gorillas both have backbones ?
sentences.chinese: 为什么蜂鸟和大猩猩都有脊骨？

sentences.english: There was a joke about a guy who sued another guy for calling him a gorilla.
sentences.chinese: 有一个人控告他的朋友叫他是大猩猩。

sentences.english: But that view of gorillas may not be deserved.
sentences.chinese: 但是，对大猩猩的这种观点可能并不公道。
